items.sentence: Have you ever wondered what might\'ve happened if Tom hadn\'t been here?
Tom can\'t believe that Mary thinks it\'s OK to let John take the blame.
Tom stopped in Boston on his way back from a business trip to Australia.
Tom took off his pants and carefully hung them over the back of a chair.
Tom usually fishes off the dock, but sometimes he fishes from the shore.
It took about five minutes to get to my uncle\'s house from the station.
The only fingerprints that the police found on the doorknob were Tom\'s.
I thought Tom would just sign the contract without reading it carefully.
I\'ve already told Tom I plan on staying in Boston for three more weeks.
Let\'s play another hand of poker. I want a chance to win my money back.
